The '''Treasure Hoarder's Map''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained after a fight with Treasure Hoarders during the {{Quest|Thief-Catcher}}.

This map shows the location of the Treasure Hoarder's camps. After completing the quest, the map will disappear from the player's inventory.
